<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Darkwood Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=312)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 586 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=273)

</column>

---

Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Darkwood Buckler (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 586 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, and BT 6.

**Craft Requirements** darkwood worth at least 50 gp
